title: More Savings. More Perks. Members Only.
short_desc: Join the Triumph Hotels Members Only Program to receive Members Only discounts and New York City hotel deals.
long_desc: Earn up to 40% off at one of Triumph's seven distinct New York hotels. Visit the elegant Upper West Side, or stay in trendy TriBeCa. Triumph Hotels presents all of Manhattan's lively personalities.
meta_content: Book NYC hotel deals with Triumph Hotels, offering exclusive specials and packages throughout Manhattan.
thumb_alt_text: More Savings. More Perks. Members Only.
